desc: Hi! You can find more of my decks Here. This deck was made with subs2srs. If you use it with Morphman, the focus morph field is named "Morph" in this template. There are instructions on how to use the card style inside the card template. If you have any issue with this deck or another, reach me on reddit or Discord. If you want to know how much you can understand a anime or a video game based on your level, you can use links and tutorials from this spreadsheet. Go into the deck's Option - Description panel to delete this text.
